prompts: Create a unique Pokemon that combines features of a turtle and a snake.
Imagine a colorful Pokemon with a hard shell and a long neck, perfect for battles.
Design a quirky Pokemon that can hide in its shell and emerge to surprise opponents.
Generate a nature-loving Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats and has vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a hybrid of a snail and an ancient creature.
Make a playful Pokemon with a shell that has eye-catching patterns and bright colors.
Give me a creative take on a Pokemon that is both defensive and adaptable in nature.
